import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput } from "mdbreact"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addHistoryInApi } from "../../Action/historyActions"; import { EditProductInApi } from "../../Action/ProductActions"; class ModalEditProduct extends Component { state = { id: this.props.product.id, reference: this.props.product.reference, name: this.props.product.name, type: this.props.product.type, collection: this.props.product.collection, color: this.props.product.color, picture: this.props.product.picture, quantity: this.props.product.quantity, box: this.props.product.box, location: this.props.product.location, mesures: this.props.product.mesures, product_status: this.props.product.produit_status, brand: this.props.product.brand, }; componentDidMount() { this.setState({ a: this.props.product }); console.log(this.state.product); } render() { return ( this.props.toggle()} fullHeight position="top" > this.props.toggle()}> Ajouter nouveaux Article
e.target.value === "" ? this.setState({ reference: this.props.element.reference, }) : this.setState({ reference: e.target.value }) } outline required > this.setState({ name: e.target.value })} outline required valueDefault={this.state.name} > this.setState({ type: e.target.value })} outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.type} > this.setState({ collection: e.target.value }) } label="collection" outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.collection} > this.setState({ brand: e.target.value })} label="Marque" outline valueDefault={this.props.element.brand} > this.setState({ color: e.target.value })} outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.color} > {" "} this.setState({ product_status: e.target.value }) } outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.product_status} > this.setState({ mesures: e.target.value }) } label="Mésures" outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.mesures} > {" "} this.setState({ location: e.target.value }) } outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.location} > {" "} this.setState({ box: e.target.value })} label="Carton" outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.box} > this.setState({ quantity: e.target.value }) } label="Quantité" outline required valueDefault={this.props.element.quantity} > this.setState({ picture: e.target.value }) } outline valueDefault={this.props.element.picture} required >
this.props.toggle()}> Close { console.log(this.state.name); }} > Modifier produit ); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.user, }); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ Addhistory: (element) => dispatch(addHistoryInApi(element)), EditProduct: (el) => dispatch(EditProductInApi(el)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(ModalEditProduct); /*{ id: this.state.id, reference: this.state.reference, name: this.state.name, type: this.state.type, collection: this.state.collection, color: this.state.color, picture: this.state.picture, quantity: this.state.quantity, box: this.state.box, location: this.state.location, mesures: this.state.mesures, product_status: this.state.produit_status, brand: this.state.brand, } */
